general.name: Name
general.remove.confirm: Are you sure to remove the item {item}?
general.removeItemConfirm: Are you sure to remove this item?

sessionExpired.title: Session expired
sessionExpired.message:
You have been logged-out.
You can keep viewing the same page or login again now.

results.none: No results match the search criteria

error.general: There was an unexpected error while processing your request
error.serverOffline:
The server couldn't be contacted.
Please, try again later.
error.invalidRequest:
It is not possible to connect to the server.
Please make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few seconds.
error.uploadSizeExceeded: The uploaded file exceeds the maximum allowed size of {size}
error.validation: The action couldn't be processed, as there were validation errors
error.staleEntity:
This data cannot be saved because it has been modified by someone else.
Please, load the page again and restart the operation.
error.removeDataInUse: This item cannot be removed because it is currently in use.

notFound.location: The location you typed or tried to access was not found
notFound.type: The requested data could not be found: {type}
notFound.typeKey: The requested data could not be found: {type} with key {key}

error.login: The given name / password are incorrect. Please, try again.
error.remoteAddressBlocked: Your IP address is blocked for exceeding login attempts
error.permission: You don't have sufficient permissions to perform the requested action

unauthorized.address: Your IP address is not allowed to login
unauthorized.url: Access is not allowed from this URL

error.loggedOut: You have been disconnected. Please, login again and repeat the operation.
error.otp: There was an error when sending the password. Please, try again later.

securityAnswer.invalid: The given security answer is invalid
securityAnswer.disabled: By exceeding the number of security question attempts, this request has been aborted. Please, contact the administration

error.illegalAction: The action you attempted to perform is invalid

geolocation.denied: No permission to get the current location. Please, grant this permission in your browser.

login.title: Login
login.message: You can login with your username and password
login.disconnected:
You have been disconnected.
Please, login again in order to view the requested page.
login.register: Not a user yet? Register here.

password.confirmationMessage: Supply your {passwordType} to confirm this operation
password.confirm.noPassword: In order to confirm you need a {passwordType}, but you do not have any
password.confirm.device.active: In order to confirm, scan this QR-code with your mobile phone
password.confirm.device.none: In order to confirm you must have a trusted mobile phone but you do not have any
password.confirm.deviceOrPassword.active: In order to confirm, either scan this QR-code with your mobile phone or supply your {password}
password.confirm.deviceOrPassword.none: In order to confirm you must have a trusted mobile phone or supply your {password} but you do not have any
password.confirm.deviceOrOtp.noMediums:
In order to confirm you need either a trusted mobile phone (and you have none) or a confirmation password, but there are no possible mediums to receive it.
Please, contact the administration.
password.confirm.deviceOrOtp.active: In order to confirm, either scan this QR-code with your mobile phone, use the previously sent confirmation password or request a new one
password.confirm.deviceOrOtp.request: In order to confirm, either scan this QR-code with your mobile phone, or request a confirmation password below
password.confirm.otp.noMediums:
In order to confirm you need a confirmation password, but there are no possible mediums to receive it.
Please, contact the administration.
password.confirm.otp.active: You can use the previously sent confirmation password or request a new one
password.confirm.otp.request: Please, request a confirmation password below in order to confirm

error.disabled: Your password has been disabled. Please, contact the administration.
error.indefinitelyBlocked: Your password has been disabled by exceeding the maximum tries. Please, contact the administration.
error.temporarilyBlocked: Your password is temporarily blocked by exceeding the maximum tries.
error.expired: Your password has expired. Please, contact the administration.
error.pending: Your password is pending activation. Please, contact the administration.

forgotten.preface: Here you can recover your user identification and change your password. Fill in your user identification below, and you will receive a verification code. You can use one of the following:
forgotten.code.sent: The verification code was sent to {to}
forgotten.generated.message: Once you submit, a new password will be generated and sent to your e-mail address
forgotten.generated.done.email: You should receive shortly an e-mail with your new password.
forgotten.generated.done.sms: You should receive shortly an SMS message with your new password.
forgotten.manual.done: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now use it to login.

expired.message.manual: In order to proceed, you must change it.
expired.message.generated:
In order to proceed, a new value must be generated.
This value will only be displayed once, so, make sure you either memorize it or write it down.
expired.generatedValue:
The value for {type} is {value}.
This value won't be displayed again, so, make sure you either memorize it or write it down.

action.change.generated.confirm: This will generate a new {type}, and the value will be displayed only once. Are you sure?
action.change.generated.done:
The value for {type} is {value}.
Make sure to memorize it, as it won't be displayed again.
action.unblock.confirm: Are you sure to unblock your {type}?
action.activate.confirm: This will activate your {type}, and the generated value will be displayed only once. Are you sure?
action.enable.confirm: Are you sure to enable your {type}?
action.disable.confirm: Are you sure to disable your {type}?

pendingAgreements.message.previouslyAccepted:
The registration agreement has been updated.

In order to continue, you must agree with the new terms.
pendingAgreements.message.firstTime: In order to complete your registration, you must agree with these terms.
pendingAgreements.agree: I agree with the following registration agreements: {agreements}
pendingAgreements.preface: I hereby declare that I have read and agree with the following:

securityQuestion.message: The security question is required in case you need to reset your password. Once set, if you need to change it, contact the administration.
securityQuestion.question: Security question

passwords.securityAnswer: You should set the security question, which will be required in case you need to reset your password.

transaction.blockScheduling.message: This will prevent scheduled installments from being automatically processed
transaction.blockScheduling.done: This scheduled payment will no longer be automatically processed
transaction.unblockScheduling.message: This will resume automatic processing for scheduled installments
transaction.unblockScheduling.done: This scheduled payment will be automatically processed
transaction.cancelScheduled.message: This will permanently cancel this scheduled payment
transaction.cancelScheduled.done: This scheduled payment has been canceled
transaction.settleScheduled.message: This will permanently mark all remaining installments as settled
transaction.settleScheduled.done: This scheduled payment has been settled
transaction.processScheduled.message: Are you sure to process now this scheduled payment?
transaction.cancelRecurring.message: This will permanently cancel the recurring payment and prevent any future occurrence
transaction.cancelRecurring.done: This recurring payment has been canceled
transaction.chargebackTransfer.message: This will return the amount of this transfer to the payer
transaction.processInstallment.message: Are you sure to process now the installment number {number}?
transaction.settleInstallment.message: Are you sure to settle the installment number {number}?
transaction.processFailedOccurrence.message: Are you sure to process now the occurrence number {number}?
transaction.changePaymentRequestExpiration: Change this payment request expiration date
transaction.changePaymentRequestExpiration.done: The payment request expiration date was changed
transaction.confirmPaymentRequest: Are you sure to send this payment request?

error.balance: Insufficient balance to perform this operation
error.upperLimit: You cannot perform this payment because the upper balance limit of the destination account has been exceeded

error.monthly.amount: The maximum monthly amount of {amount} was exceeded

error.totalOpenAmount: The total amount of all open vouchers would exceed {maxAmount}, as defined in this voucher type. The current total open amount is {currentAmount}.

buy.amountForPeriod: Buying on this voucher type is limited by period. Until {date} only {amount} is available for buying.
buy.openAmount: The current user exceeds the maximum allowed open amount of {maxAmount} for vouchers of this type. The current open amount is {currentAmount}.
buy.notAllowedForUser: The current user is not allowed to buy vouchers from this type.

registration.group.public: Choose the group you want to participate
registration.group.manager: Choose the group for the new user
registration.active.public: You have been successfully registered, and your account is now active.
registration.inactive.public:
Your account was successfully created.
However, you will need to be activated by the administration.
You will be notified when your account is active.
registration.pending.public:
Your registration has been submitted, and needs to be verified.
You should receive an e-mail shortly with instructions on how to activate your account.
If you don't receive the e-mail, make sure to check your spam / junk folder.

registration.inactive.manager: The user {user} has been registered, however, still needs activatation by the administration.

ad.addedProduct: The product was added to cart
ad.addedProductOrder: The product was added to the order
ad.addedProductAlreadyInCart: The product was added to cart (this item has been added previously to your cart)

adjustedQuantity.max: - the quantity demanded cannot be delivered, because there is a maximum of items you are allowed to have in your shopping cart. The quantity of this article is automatically reduced.
adjustedQuantity.min: - the quantity demanded cannot be delivered, because there is a minimum of items you are allowed to have in your shopping cart. The quantity of this article is automatically increased.
adjustedQuantity.stock: - the quantity demanded cannot be delivered, because the article is almost out of stock. The quantity of this article is automatically reduced.

ad.articlesNotice:
Please notice, some articles in your shopping cart:
{notice}
ad.backToDraft: The advertisement is now in draft mode
ad.cartEmpty: This cart is empty. Search marketplace for products and services to buy
ad.chooseSeller: Choose a seller from the list below to continue with the shopping cart process

error.cannotBuyFromSeller: At the moment, you are not allowed to buy products from this user. Please contact your administrator.
error.cannotProceedToCheckout: You can not proceed with checkout because some items are unavailable or you do not have enough balance
error.notEnoughStock: The quantity demanded cannot be delivered, because the article is almost out of stock.

ad.deliveryPriceToBeConfirmed: The delivery price is not yet known and the total amount is not the final one. After the seller has set the delivery price, you still can reject or confirm the order.

ad.noDeliveryMethodsAvailable: No delivery methods for the selected currency
ad.questionAsked: The question has been submitted to the seller
ad.orderSavedAsDraft: The order was saved as draft
ad.orderSubmittedToBuyer: The order was submitted to buyer
ad.question: Question
ad.submitToBuyerConfirmation: Are you sure to submit this order to the buyer? After this step, no further changes will be allowed in this order, and it will be awaiting for buyer's approval.
ad.pendingForAuth: The advertisement has been submitted for further authorization
ad.reserveAmount: This amount will be reserved when the order is confirmed, and will be debited from your account once the order is accepted by the seller.
ad.orderWaitingForSellersApproval: The order has been created and is waiting for sellers approval
ad.webshopSettingsSaved: The web shop settings were saved

notificationSettings.title: Notification settings
notificationSettings.notAvailableSettings: You are not allowed to change any settings.
notificationSettings.forwardMessages: Forward internal messages to your email address
notificationSettings.smsCount: You have used {count} of {total} free SMS messages this month.

identityProvider.login.noMatch: No user found with e-mail {email}. You will need to login with your regular user and password. After logging-in, your {app} account will be automatically linked, so, on the next time, the 'Continue with {provider}' functionality will work directly.
identityProvider.login.noEmail: Couldn't read an e-mail address from your {provider} account. You will need to login with your regular user and password. After logging-in, your {app} account will be automatically linked, so, on the next time, the 'Continue with {provider}' functionality will work directly.
identityProvider.registration: Register faster with your identity provider:
identityProvider.registration.disclaimer: Disclaimer: None of your {app} data will be shared with these providers, and the only purpose of reading your personal data from them is to fill in the registration form and logging you in after you're registered.
identityProvider.disclaimer: Disclaimer: None of your {app} data will be shared with any provider. The only data read from the providers are your display name and e-mail, with the sole purpose to logging-in faster on {app}.
identityProvider.noResults: There are not identity providers added yet.

action.connect.done: You can now login as {name} using {provider}
action.disconnect.confirm: This will disable the 'Continue with {provider}' functionality. Are you sure?
action.disconnect.done: The login with {provider} has been disabled
